short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to summarize and ace quizzes effortlessly!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ace your exams and simplify your study sessions with FormGenius, the ultimate Chrome extension for students!

Why Choose This Extension?

üìö Text Summarization: Quickly generate summaries of any text on a webpage to save time and grasp key points faster.
üìù Quiz Assistance: Get help answering quizzes effortlessly on platforms like Google Forms, Microsoft Forms, and even restricted ones like Codetantra.
‚ö° Instant Productivity: Designed to reduce stress and boost your focus, this tool is perfect for busy students juggling multiple tasks.

Note: These tests were conducted on dummy questions created by me. I strongly discourage using this tool to cheat on exams. It is designed to help you retrieve answers from forms that don‚Äôt reveal whether your choices were correct after submission to improve on weak topics.

Install now!
